Package edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing

Class ProcessorServer.Builder

java.lang.Object
edu.umn.nlpie.mtap.processing.ProcessorServer.Builder
Direct Known Subclasses:
ProcessorServerOptions, WordOccurrencesExampleProcessor.Options
Enclosing class:
ProcessorServer
public static class ProcessorServer.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
Args4j command-line supported options bean for processor servers.

      Prints a help message.
      Parameters:
      parser - The CmdLineParser that was used to parse.
      mainClass - The main class this was invoked from.
      e - Optional: the exception thrown by the parser.
      output - Optional: An output stream to write the help message to, by default will use System.err.

    • getIdentifier

      @Nullable public @Nullable java.lang.String getIdentifier()
      An optional identifier to replace the processor's default identifier for service registration and discovery.
      Returns:
      A dns-complaint (only alphanumeric characters and dashes -) string

    • setIdentifier

      public void setIdentifier​(@Nullable @Nullable java.lang.String identifier)

      this builder.

    • getUniqueServiceId

      @Nullable public @Nullable java.lang.String getUniqueServiceId()
      Gets a unique, per-instance service identifier used to register and deregister the processor with service discovery. Note: This identifier is not used to discover the service like getIdentifier(), only to enable de-registration of this specific service instance.
      Returns:
      String identifier or a random UUID if not set.

    • setUniqueServiceId

      public void setUniqueServiceId​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String uniqueServiceId)
      Sets a unique, per-instance service identifier used to register and deregister the processor with service discovery. Note: This identifier is not used to discover the service like getIdentifier(), only to enable de-registration of this specific service instance.
      Parameters:
      uniqueServiceId - A string identifier unique to this service instance.

    • uniqueServiceId

      @NotNull public @NotNull ProcessorServer.Builder uniqueServiceId​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String uniqueServiceId)
      Sets a unique, per-instance service identifier used to register and deregister the processor with service discovery. Note: This identifier is not used to discover the service like getIdentifier(), only to enable de-registration of this specific service instance.
      Parameters:
      uniqueServiceId - A string identifier unique to this service instance.
      Returns:
      this builder
